Title: Warn Stoneplow
Description:
My father gave me his life. Tyrande gave me her trust. My sentinels gave me their allegiance.

It is time I repaid them all.

With Brojai dead we can mop up the remaining mogu. The next threat is the mantid.

Go north to Stoneplow and lend them your help. Tell them I will be bringing what sentinels I can muster to aid in the defense of their city against the mantid.
ObjectivesText: Travel to Stoneplow Village in Valley of the Four Winds.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Travel to Stoneplow in the Valley of the Four Winds.
RewardText: Mantid from the south? This is not a good day.
